item.title: Encrypt and decrypt files to public keys via the OpenSSL Command Line
item.description: This small tutorial will show you how to use the openssl command line to encrypt and decrypt a file using a public key. We will first generate a random key, encrypt that random key against the public key of the other person and use that random key to encrypt the actual file with using symmetric encryption.
